title: Silicon Based Sample Carrier for Cryogenic Electron Microscopy
content: Cryo-electron microscopy (CryoEM) has been proven as invaluable tool for small biomolecule structure determination ranging from proteins to viruses and DNA. Nevertheless. since the introduction of TEM and cryoEM the sample carrier (grid) has remained largely unchanged. Meanwhile microfabrication has made leaps due to the semiconductor industry. In this abstract we present a silicon-based sample carrier made with microfabrication techniques.
